EmailTemplate.subject: Please call me so I can help you today
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Thanks for your interest in ProSeries® Tax software! Congratulations, you’ve already taken the first step in becoming compliant with the IRS by looking into using a professional tax software, but did you know that you have to register as a small business and an eFile preparer? No need to worry – I’m here to personally help you if you have any questions about the process. This is standard protocol and easy to do; it takes the IRS about 30-45 days to process the requests. That’s why I’d like to speak with you as soon as possible, so I can walk you through the 3 steps needed to become a professional tax preparer.
I also wanted to make you aware that ProSeries is built on the same platform as TurboTax. This means that you upgrade your tax software, all your client data will flow over smoothly and quickly, helping you to be up and running in no time.
Call me directly at {!User.Phone} or let me know the best day and time you can be reached, and I’ll help get you compliant and up-and-running in no time.
Regards, {!User.Name} ProSeries Tax Consultant {!User.Phone} {!User.Email} Intuit Accountants
IMPORTANT: Intuit respects the personal nature of email communication. Every effort is made to offer only information that may be of value to you or your business. If you do not wish to receive marketing email from Intuit in the future, please click here.
If you have any questions or comments, please DO NOT REPLY to this email. Contact Customer Service at 800.765.7777 for assistance. If you receive an email message that appears to come from Intuit but that you suspect is a phishing email, please forward it immediately to spoof@intuit.com.
